text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg I hope your insistence that MPs attend Parliament in person doesn’t result in any of them (or their families) contracting Covid19 if they came within 2m of the Business Secretary. Crazy to demand 19th century proceedings during a 21st century pandemic.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
